intro: Calotheca stricta, commonly known as the rigid calotheca, is a species of flowering plant in the family Malvaceae. It is characterized by its upright growth habit and narrow, lance-shaped leaves. The plant produces small, pale yellow flowers that are clustered in dense inflorescences. It is native to tropical and subtropical regions of the Americas. Calotheca stricta is often found in moist, shaded environments such as forests and wetlands.
